TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {199993=Morarjee Text is in the Textiles - Spinning - Cotton Blended sector. The current market capitalisation stands at Rs 188.93 crore. The company management includes Urvi A Piramal - Chairperson, Harsha A Piramal - Executive Vice Chairman, R K Rewari - Managing Director, Mahesh S Gupta - Director, Shobhan Thakore - Director, Ranjan Sanghi - Director, Ranjan Pant - Addnl.Independent Director, Aditya Mangaldas - Director. It is listed on the BSE with a BSE Code of 532621 and the NSE with an NSE Code of MORARJEE. Its Registered office is at Peninsula Spenta, Mathuradas Mills Compound,,Senapati Bapat Marg, Mumbai,Maharashtra - 400013. Their Registrars are Freedom Registry Ltd., 133955=28 July 2015, 135173=JSWSteel Jul Fut, 134466=UnitedBrewerie Jul Fut, 198684=Astec LifeSciences Recommended on Mar 31st 2015}
